title: The Decline of Grammar - comparison baseball

content.question: In the last sentence of the first paragraph, the speaker refers to a possible comparison between baseball players of different eras to illustrate that

choices.label: people readily forget the glories of past eras
pessimistic attitudes about change are usually warranted
judgments about declining standards are difficult to support
respect for traditions has declined in many areas

content.answer: judgments about declining standards are difficult to support
